News

End of term service

June 16, 2014 admin

Thursday 19 June

This year the end of term service is in the  afternoon. The  celebration will be begin at 1.45 and Primary 7 will be reflecting on their time at Hyndland Primary and there will be presentations for the Leavers. Hoping to see many of you there. This is not a religious service.

There will also be musical performances. If anyone is free to drive music stands etc. to the church please let Andrew or Jane know.
